headline: Ask HN: Latest Covid Avoidance Recommendations?
description:
I have managed to keep a low profile since the start of COVID and have avoided it to date with the usual methods of mask, distancing, vaccine, etc.

I have an event coming up where these methods won't be possible. I won't be able to wear a mask and it is indoors so will be hard to distance.

I'm OK with that, but curious if anyone has any hacky recommendations of methods to reduce risk in lieu of the typical methods? Preferably low risk high reward type methods.

As an example I am considering an over the counter Azelastine nasal spray.

Chances are that I won't use any of the recommendations but it will be interesting to hear what everyone says.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 最新的Covid规避建议？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 最新的Covid規避建議？
description_zh-Hans:
自COVID开始以来，我一直设法保持低调，并通过戴口罩、拉开距离、接种疫苗等常规方法来避免它。

我即将参加一个活动，这些方法是不可能的。我不能戴口罩，而且是在室内，所以很难拉开距离。

我可以接受，但我很好奇，如果有人能推荐一些降低风险的方法来代替典型的方法？最好是低风险、高回报的方法。

例如，我正在考虑使用非处方的阿兹拉斯丁鼻喷雾剂。

我有可能不会使用任何建议，但听听大家怎么说会很有趣。
